title: Tropica Sweets
description: Landing page for a Palm Sugar Export Company based in Indonesia

content.paragraph: As my first ever Professional Job, i chose Vue + NuxtJS since its the only techstack i mastered. The Client request a simple Landing Page for its Sugar Export Company. I Personally designed and code the whole website myself, alongside my busy college tasks. Cant say its pleasant, but the jobs done ontime.
Everything was set by myself, from UI/UX Designing to Code to Deployment, Domain Registration, and Server Purchasing. I Kinda get the glimpse on how CI/CD a website works with this.
